columns.AlbumId: The unique identifier for each album.
columns.Title: The name of the album.
columns.ArtistId: The identifier for the artist of the album.

Album.table_description: The table stores information about music albums.

columns.ArtistId: The unique identifier for each artist.
columns.Name: The name of the artist or band.

Artist.table_description: The table stores information about various music artists.

columns.CustomerId: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.FirstName: The first name of the customer.
columns.LastName: The last name of the customer.
columns.Company: The company name associated with the customer.
columns.Address: The street address of the customer.
columns.City: The city where the customer resides.
columns.State: The state or region of the customer.
columns.Country: The country of the customer's residence.
columns.PostalCode: The postal code for the customer's address.
columns.Phone: The telephone number of the customer.
columns.Fax: The fax number of the customer.
columns.Email: The email address for communication with the customer.
columns.SupportRepId: The identifier for the customer's support representative.

Customer.table_description: The table stores customer details for service and contact purposes.

columns.EmployeeId: The unique identifier for each employee.
columns.LastName: The last name of the employee.
columns.FirstName: The first name of the employee.
columns.Title: The job title of the employee.
columns.ReportsTo: The identifier for the employee's direct supervisor.
columns.BirthDate: The birth date of the employee.
columns.HireDate: The date when the employee was hired.
columns.Address: The street address of the employee.
columns.City: The city where the employee resides.
columns.State: The state or region of the employee.
columns.Country: The country of the employee's residence.
columns.PostalCode: The postal code for the employee's address.
columns.Phone: The telephone number of the employee.
columns.Fax: The fax number of the employee.
columns.Email: The email address of the employee.

Employee.table_description: The table stores employee information for organizational management.

columns.PlaylistId: The unique identifier for each playlist.
columns.TrackId: The unique identifier for each track in the playlist.

PlaylistTrack.table_description: The table manages the association between playlists and tracks.

columns.TrackId: The unique identifier for each track.
columns.Name: The title of the music track.
columns.AlbumId: The identifier for the album containing the track.
columns.MediaTypeId: The identifier for the media type of the track.
columns.GenreId: The identifier for the genre of the track.
columns.Composer: The name of the composer for the track.
columns.Milliseconds: The duration of the track in milliseconds.
columns.Bytes: The size of the track file in bytes.
columns.UnitPrice: The sales price of the track.

Track.table_description: The table stores detailed information about individual music tracks.

columns.GenreId: The unique identifier for each genre.
columns.Name: The name of the music genre.

Genre.table_description: The table categorizes music into various genres for organization.

columns.InvoiceId: The unique identifier for each invoice.
columns.CustomerId: The identifier for the customer associated with the invoice.
columns.InvoiceDate: The date and time when the invoice was issued.
columns.BillingAddress: The street address for billing purposes.
columns.BillingCity: The city of the billing address.
columns.BillingState: The state or region of the billing address.
columns.BillingCountry: The country of the billing address.
columns.BillingPostalCode: The postal code for the billing address.
columns.Total: The total amount charged in the invoice.

Invoice.table_description: The table records billing details and invoice transactions.

columns.InvoiceLineId: The unique identifier for each line item in the invoice.
columns.InvoiceId: The identifier for the invoice associated with the line item.
columns.TrackId: The identifier for the track being sold in the line item.
columns.UnitPrice: The price per unit of the track in the line item.
columns.Quantity: The quantity of the track purchased in the line item.

InvoiceLine.table_description: The table records individual track purchases within each invoice.

columns.MediaTypeId: The unique identifier for each media type.
columns.Name: The name of the media type for digital content.

MediaType.table_description: The table categorizes different types of media for digital tracks.

columns.PlaylistId: The unique identifier for each playlist.
columns.Name: The name of the playlist.

Playlist.table_description: The table organizes various music playlists for easy access.
